form.label: darkfalcon_control_detail
form.description: Used for viewing and updating security controls

search.query:
| inputlookup df_control_detail.csv
| append [ stats count | eval input_control_id = trim("$input_control_id$") | eval control_name= trim("$input_control_name$") | eval control_description = trim("$input_description$") | eval vendor_raw = trim("$input_vendor$") |rex field=vendor_raw "(?<control_vendor_shortname>.*)\-(?<control_vendor>.*)"
| eval added_datetime = now() | eval date_added = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | eval date_updated = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | table * | join type=outer [ rest /services/authentication/current-context/context | fields + username | rename username as contact ] | fields - _raw _time count | appendcols [ |inputlookup df_control_detail.csv | eval vendor_raw = trim("$input_vendor$") | rex field=vendor_raw "(?<control_vendor_short>.*)\-(?<control_vendor>.*)" | where like(df_control_id,control_vendor_short."-%") | sort -df_control_id | head 1 | rex field=df_control_id "(?<temp_vend_short>.*)\-(?<control_id>.*)" | append [|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv| eval temp_control_id=1337|fields temp_control_id| head 1] | eval vendor_raw = trim("$input_vendor$") | rex field=vendor_raw "(?<control_vendor_short>.*)\-(?<control_vendor>.*)" | fillnull value=0 control_id | eval control_id=if(control_id!=0,(control_id+1),1) | eval control_int="000000".control_id| rex field=control_int "(?<control_int>\d{4})$" | eval updated_control_id=control_vendor_short."-".control_int | fields updated_control_id ] | eval df_control_id=if(input_control_id="new",updated_control_id,df_control_id) ]
| sort -added_datetime | dedup control_vendor, control_name | sort -date_added
| fields df_control_id, control_vendor, control_name, control_description, contact, date_added
| outputlookup df_control_detail.csv
| inputlookup df_control_detail.csv | table df_control_id control_vendor control_name control_description contact date_added | sort df_control_id
